text: The 1982 Brent Council election took place on 6 May 1982 to elect members of Brent London Borough Council in London, England. The whole council was up for election and the council went in no overall control. ==Background== ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1982 Category:1982 London Borough council elections Category:May 1982 events
title: 1982 Brent London Borough Council election
